backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no logic.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report describing a fix for bouquet image loading with base‑path support and fallback behavior.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries for all frontend files, covering components, sections, hooks, assets, and configuration.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining OKLCH color variables for light/dark themes and global element resets.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading fonts and mounting the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app component assembling all sections, overlays, and global UI providers.
frontend/src/components/AudioToggle.tsx: Button-based audio controller that loads and toggles looping background music with error handling.
frontend/src/components/BouquetRoses.tsx: Grid of eight animated rose buttons that trigger rose note dialogs when clicked.
frontend/src/components/HiddenMessage.ts: Hover/tap‑revealed tooltip-style message component with accessible interactions.
frontend/src/components/LoveNoteDialog.t: Dialog displaying the selected rose’s love note with themed styling.
frontend/src/components/ReduceMotionTogg: Toggle for enabling or disabling reduced-motion mode by adding a document-wide class.
frontend/src/components/Reveal.tsx: Wrapper that animates content into view using IntersectionObserver.
frontend/src/components/RosePetalsOverla: Canvas animation of falling rose petals, disabled when reduced-motion is preferred.
frontend/src/components/sections/EndingS: Final section with animated hearts and closing Rose Day message.
frontend/src/components/sections/Landing: Intro section with animated heart, romantic text, and hidden message interaction.
frontend/src/components/sections/LoveNot: Displays a styled love letter section pulling title, paragraphs, and signature from roseDayCopy with reveal animation.
frontend/src/components/sections/Virtual: Shows a virtual rose bouquet with selectable roses that open love notes, handling image errors and using modal dialog.
frontend/src/components/sections/WhyFavo: Renders a list of reasons from roseDayCopy with reveal effects and a hidden message component.
frontend/src/content/roseDayCopy.ts: Provides all static copy for the site including landing text, reasons, virtual gift messages, rose notes, and love letter content.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on Internet Identity, refetching dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity auth context, handling login, stored identity loading, and exposing identity state and helpers.
frontend/src/hooks/usePrefersReducedMoti: Hook that tracks system reduced‑motion preference via matchMedia.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Empty placeholder file indicating no backend queries are needed.
frontend/src/hooks/useRevealOnScroll.ts: Hook using IntersectionObserver to report visibility of an element for reveal animations.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind setup plus custom variables, themes, motion‑reduction rules, background, and utility animations.
frontend/src/lib/assetUrl.ts: Builds asset URLs respecting Vite's BASE_URL and normalizing paths.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the app, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with typography, container queries, custom fonts, OKLCH color palette, extended border radii, and shadows.
project_state.json: Defines project state, requirements, romantic website goals, known issues, and existing feature specifications for the Rose Day site.
